name: FelisFire: Highlight Patch and Crafting Items
description: The FelisFire version of the "Flight Rising: Highlight Swipp & Baldwin Items v2" by Zoga. Patch items, items used in Casey's Crafting, and items used in events are highlighted or outlined. Items used in Casey's Crafting are back-lit in purple Patch items are outlined in red. Event items are outlined in blue. Highlighted Event Items are: Candle Wax, Doubloon, Rabbit, and Rabbit Foot. (Discs, Orbs, Grams, and Easter Eggs are not highlighted.) NOTE: This does not provide an advantage when gathering. The highlighting/outlining does not show above the panel before you click a square. You cannot see what's under the panels.
css:
